content: free version on my blog i thought it looked like a round fan so i named it fan-tastic the square is 12 in size using 4 colors of aran weight yarn and a j crochet hook if you use a thinner yarn it will be a little smaller but you can add rounds stitches used are your basic single_crochet double_crochet half-double_crochet treble_crochet and front-post stitches vary the color placement for a different look part of the nuts about squares cal video tutorial by esther djikstra available https //www youtube com/watch v=clftu3mqhd0 come to my blog for a free version of this pattern and stay and look around i am offering this pattern as a paid pattern as well via ravelry because some people prefer to store patterns in their ravelry library and the convenience of a printer-friendly pdf subscribe to my blog at http //julieyeagerdesigns com and don t miss a post enjoy
